moves.1. d4 d5 2. c4 dxc4: This gambit is alwasyt tricky fr me. I have lost many games playing against it incorrectly and still am not sure what is best to do.
moves.3. Nc3 Nc6 4. Nf3 Nf6 5. e4 Bg4 6. Be3 e: It seems that he had attacking possibilities for the past several moves, but opted to play defensively. It has permitted me to improve my development and make some threats of my own.
Once I get castled I think I have a strong position and I may take the Knight on c3 to give him some Pawns that willb e hard to defend.
moves.12. Bxf6 gxf6 13. O-O Bxc3 14. bxc3 Ne5: Now comes a tricky exchange that I think I can win. There are complexities that might trip me up, though.
He did just what I had hoped he would. Now he resigns, but it seems that there is still hoe for him. He could just move the King to h2 and live to fight on. No?
